amendment.description: An amendment numbered 64 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to prohibit funding from being used to support the allocation of International Monetary Fund reserve assets (Special Drawing Rights) to Iran.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hill amendment (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hill amendment (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hill amendment (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.
